sentence.Network_en: Investors should consider putting some money into an annuity.
sentence.Network_cn: 投资者们应当考虑存一些年金。
亚历山大获得了一份数额不大的年金.

sentence.Network_en: My pension has plummeted and now I have to buy an annuity.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的退休金暴跌,现在必须去买一份年金(annuity)了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 年字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 年鉴〖 annals;yearbook〗 年金〖 annuity〗 年景〖 theyear’sharvest〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... anniversary 周年纪念 annuity 年金；养老金 perennial 终年的；长期的.
股票与证券行业英语词汇 ... amortize 摊提，分期偿还债务 annuity 年金享受权 asking price 卖主的开叫价.
BEC中级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... amass vt. 积聚，收集 annuity n. 年金；年金保险 amateur n. 业余爱好者.

list.abs: 会计术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库文档 ... option 选择权 ordinary annuity 普通年金 organization costs 开办费.
会计英语-财务财经词条 ... 2871 per mensem 按月 2872 perpetual annuity 永续年金 2873 perpetual inventory 永续盘存.
终身年金(life annuity)是什么? 终身年金养老保险金融支付在博迪的金融学书里看到了终身年金(life annuity),解释是只要购买者生存则每月支付固定金额的合约。这.
会计词汇E ... deferral 递延项目 deferred annuity 延期年金 deferred expenses 递延费用.
递延年金（deferred annuity）（ Deferred annuity ）：也称延期年金，是指第一次收付款项发生时间不在第一期末，而是隔若干期后才开始发生的系列等 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from French annuité, from medieval Latin annuitas, from Latin annuus 'yearly', from annus 'year'

entry.tran: 年金保险合同;年金保险
entry.def: An annuity is an investment or insurance policy that pays someone a fixed sum of money each year.

means.word_mean: 1. income from capital investment paid in a series of regular payments;

sentences.sentence: "his retirement fund was set up to be paid as an annuity"

auth_sentence.content: It becomes a kind of permanent annuity for the author.
auth_sentence.res_content: It becomes a kind of permanent annuity for the author.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It becomes a kind of permanent annuity for the author.

auth_sentence.content: Experts think annuity rates could drop even lower.
auth_sentence.res_content: Experts think annuity rates could drop even lower.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Experts think annuity rates could drop even lower.

auth_sentence.content: Conversely, men are likely to see lower annuity incomes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Conversely, men are likely to see lower annuity incomes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Conversely, men are likely to see lower annuity incomes.

stems_affixes.word_buile: anni=ann年,一年+vers转+ary表名词→一年转到一次→周年纪念日
super超过,过度+annu=ann年,一年+ate具有……的→过分老的
ann年,一年+al状态+s→一年状态的综合→纪年表,年鉴,年报
annu=ann年,一年+ity表名词→每年都有的→年金
